title: Bob Scobey - Vol. 1, The Scobey Story (GTCD 12032)
description:
Here is the history of Bob Scooby found inside the CD cover.  it is also included in the download.
 <a href="
http://extraimago.com/images/2015/07/19/ScobeyHistory.jpg" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://extraimago.com/images/2015/07/19/ScobeyHistory.jpg</a>

- Big Papi

[quote="By Dr. Robert Hackler"]

I got a chance to meet Bob Scobey and Clancy Hayes when I was a student at Northwestern University and began collecting Frisco Band sides about that time. Some of these early Good Time Jazz records show the hard driving rhythm and some do not feature Clancy Hayes on vocal. "Coney Island Washboard" has both Scobey and Clancy singing and is one of their best recordings. Bob resurrects many of the Lu Watters Jazz Band standards. This is an excellent introduction to the Bob Scobey musical arrangements.[/quote]
[img]http://extraimago.com/images/2015/07/19/Folder05c09.md.jpg[/img]
